cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.12)

project("JuceSandbox")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(JuceSandbox_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/JuceSandbox.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "~/JUCE/modules")


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${JuceSandbox_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "o8NDKl"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "JuceSandbox"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  USE_GLOBAL_APPCONFIG_HEADER OFF
  ADD_USING_NAMESPACE_JUCE_TO_JUCE_HEADER OFF
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  PROJECT_TYPE "GUI Application"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.JuceSandbox"
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "C++17"
)

)

  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON

)
